Distribution. Central America: Mexico , Guatemala , Belize and Honduras ; South America: Colombia and Brazil ( Attems 1930 ; Bücherl 1942 ; Schileyko & Minelli 1998 ). In Colombia
N. stolli
is known from the Amazonian, Orinoquia and Andean regions.
